programme.title: Dreading Vows
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E04, Doug and Carrie decide to renew their wedding vows, then try to cancel the ceremony; Arthur debates keeping his wedding present for himself.

programme.title: Nocturnal Omission
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E05, Doug decides not to ruin Deacon's weekend with a beautiful stewardess by telling him about his ex-wife's plans.

programme.title: Affidavit Justice
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E06, When the partners of Carrie's law firm notice Doug's softball skills, they ask him to pretend he is a lawyer and play on the company team; Arthur believes his great-grandfather was a slave owner.

programme.title: Secret Garden
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E07, Carrie's relationship with her gynecologist (Judge Reinhold) is in jeopardy when Doug's cousin charges the doctor more than he quoted for landscaping work.

programme.title: Eggsit Strategy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E08, After hearing of possible layoffs at her law firm, Carrie begins to worry about her own job security; Doug loses Deacon's lucky Koosh ball.

programme.title: Thanks, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E09, An unexpected visit from a stranger interrupts the Heffernans' Thanksgiving dinner. Lou Ferrigno and Merrin Dungey guest star.

programme.title: American Idle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E10, Doug gets annoyed after Carrie loses her job, becomes extremely unmotivated and lazes around the house.

programme.title: Santa Claustrophobia
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E11, Carrie drives Doug crazy when she takes a part-time job at IPS during the holiday season; Arthur tries to bring everyone together for a Christmas portrait.

programme.title: Dougie Houser
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E12, Carrie reminds Doug of a past incident at their first house when he wants to buy a chainsaw from an infomercial.

programme.title: Frigid Heirs
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E13, After Arthur wins $2,500 playing bingo, a dispute erupts over how the money should be spent; Doug wants to purchase golf clubs, while Carrie would like to go to a day spa.

programme.title: Switch Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E14, Deacon and Kelly decide to take Arthur out to dinner so Doug and Carrie can be alone, but they ignore a warning about Arthur's reaction to spicy food.

programme.title: Cheap Saks
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E15, Carrie discovers Doug's annoying ex-girlfriend (Janeane Garofalo) has an employee discount at Saks Fifth Avenue.

programme.title: Damned Yanky
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E16, Carrie catches Doug fantasizing about other women while he is under sedation at the hospital. Steffiana De La Cruz and Angelo Pagan guest star.

programme.title: Multiple Plots
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E17, Carrie, still unemployed, helps Holly with dog walking; Arthur sells his burial plot to Spence's mother, Veronica (Anne Meara).

programme.title: Trash Talker
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E18, Doug's grade-school nemesis (guest star Jon Favreau) is Deacon's new friend and may become Carrie's new boss.

programme.title: Precedent Nixin
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E19, Carrie's plan to stay at a hotel while visiting Florida backfires when the hotel is overrun by spring breakers.

programme.title: Foe: Pa
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E20, When Arthur embarrasses Carrie at a job interview, Doug must heal the breach between father and daughter.

programme.title: Tank Heaven
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E21, Doug sabotages Carrie's efforts to socialize with her co-workers by doing crass things, such as showing them his chest hair. Amy Stiller guest stars.

programme.title: Alter Ego
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E22, Doug, Deacon, Danny and Spence take an impulsive trip to Memphis to try to stop the wedding of Spence's ex-girlfriend (Rachel Dratch).

programme.title: Icky Shuffle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E23, Carrie comes down with a cold; Arthur must find a teammate for the senior center's shuffleboard tournament.

programme.title: Awful Bigamy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E24, When Holly is kicked out of her apartment, Arthur insists she stay with him until she can find someplace new to live.

programme.title: Lost Vegas
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E01, Doug takes Carrie to a spa, hoping it will get her to let him take a trip to Vegas with the guys; Arthur teaches Spence his trick for beating the house in blackjack.

programme.title: Durgan Groupie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E02, Jealous of Carrie's new job, Doug asks his boss for a promotion and gets put in charge of safety.

programme.title: Furious Gorge
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E03, Carrie makes Doug join a support group for overeaters, but he secretly joins an abusive relationship group where he blames his eating on her.

programme.title: Entertainment Weakly
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E04, Doug sends a new driver on the wrong route, but the plan backfires when the man winds up in the hospital.

programme.title: Name Dropper
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E05, Doug digs a deeper hole for himself when he fakes a heart attack to avoid angering Carrie for not knowing her friend's name.

programme.title: Offtrack...Bedding
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E06, Doug goes looking for his father at a model train convention and notices his mother with very seductive Arthur Spooner.

programme.title: Silent Mite
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E07, Doug and Arthur play detective when Doug suspects an admirer of Carrie has stolen his wallet.

programme.title: Awed Couple
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E08, Deacon and Kelly find new couple friends, forcing Doug and Carrie to turn to their old reliable couple friends, Neal and Marcy.

programme.title: Cologne Ranger
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E09, Doug wears a cologne Carrie dislikes to try to convince himself and the guys that she does not control him.

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E10, Carrie gets a raise and hires a Spanish-speaking housekeeper, but the language barrier frustrates Doug, who retaliates by hiring Veronica as his personal housekeeper.

programme.title: Pour Judgement
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E11, Carrie is upset when Doug does not take an exam that could have led to a promotion, so he retaliates by becoming a bartender.

programme.title: Gym Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E12, When Doug and Carrie start training with their neighbor (Lou Ferrigno) so Carrie can lose a few pounds, Doug works out a deal that allows him to laze around during exercise time.

programme.title: Gorilla Warfare
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E13, When Carrie learns Doug stole the romantic line he used when they started dating, he struggles to come up with a new one for Valentine's Day to try to redeem himself.

programme.title: Hi, School
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E14, When Doug makes a delivery to his former high school, the football coach (Burt Reynolds) treats him like a hero, so Doug begins stopping by more often.

programme.title: Deconstructing Carrie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E15, As Carrie reluctantly approaches her 35th birthday, Doug bribes neighborhood construction workers to hoot and holler at her in order to make her feel younger.

programme.title: Black List
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E16, Doug tries to find his roots when Deacon snubs him for a new black friend, and Carrie's manicurist refuses to see her.

programme.title: Coach's Daughter
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E05, Coach discourages his daughter from marrying her pompous and rude fiancé.

programme.title: Any Friend of Diane's
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E06, After a ruined romance with an intellectual, Diane's prim friend Rebecca confides she's looking for a fling with someone earthy. To Diane's dismay, she sets her sights on Sam.

programme.title: Friends, Romans, and Accountants
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E07, Norm asks Diane to fill in as his bosses' date for the firm's annual bash.

programme.title: Truce or Consequences
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E08, Sam steps in as a mediator between the bickering Carla and Diane.

programme.title: Coach Returns to Action
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E09, Coach feels he can't compete with Sam when they fall for the same woman.

programme.title: Endless Slumper
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E10, Sam loans out his lucky cap to a baseball player who's in a slump.

programme.title: One for the Book
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E11, Inebriated for the first time in his life, a timid young priest-to-be makes an amorous advance toward Diane and concludes he's not fit for the monastery.

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in for a Cold One
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E12, Diane incurs the wrath of Sam and the entire Cheers clan when she exposes a customer who spouts captivating, tall-tales of his exploits as a World War II spy.

programme.title: Now Pitching, Sam Malone
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E13, A casting agent pursues Sam, offering more than just a business proposition.

programme.title: Let Me Count the Ways
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E14, Saddened by the death of her cat, Diane gains little sympathy from the Cheers clan and begins to reevaluate her relationships with everyone, especially Sam.

programme.title: Father Knows Last
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E15, Diane is aghast when a very pregnant Carla tricks the surprised, but ecstatic egghead Marshall Lipton into believing he's the father.

programme.title: The Boys in the Bar
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E16, Sam's shocked when his ex-teammate comes out of the closet at the bar.

programme.title: Diane's Perfect Date
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E17, Sam unknowingly hires and ex-murderer to escort Diane on a double date.

programme.title: No Contest
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E18, Sam enters a photo of Diane in the annual Miss Boston Barmaid contest.

programme.title: Pick a Con, Any Con
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E19, Sam tries to set up a sting to catch a crooked poker player. When Sam learns that a conman has taken thousands of dollars from Coach, he turns to Harry "The Hat" to help them get the money back.

programme.title: Someone Single, Someone Blue
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E20, Diane proposes marriage to Sam in order to save her mom's inheritance.

programme.title: Show Down (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E21, Sam is chagrined when his brother captivates everyone at Cheers, especially Diane, whose budding romance with the dashing Derek sparks Sam's jealously and confusion.

programme.title: Show Down (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E22, Sam and Diane are forced to come to grips with their feelings about each other when Diane's relationship with Sam's brother grows more serious.

programme.title: Power Play
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E01, Sam and Diane's new relationship together gets off to a shaky start, which comes as no surprise to anyone at the bar.

programme.title: Lil Sister Don't Cha
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E02, While Carla's in labor, her promiscuous sister goes on the prowl at Cheers.

programme.title: Personal Business
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E03, Diane takes another job when Carla complains that she's getting special treatment.

programme.title: Homicidal Ham
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E04, Diane's efforts backfire when she allows an ex-con take the stage at Cheers.

programme.title: Sumner's Return
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E05, Diane doesn't tell Sam that she is going out to dinner with her ex-fiancé Sumner and his wife, because she thinks he will embarrass her if he comes along.

programme.title: Affairs of the Heart
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E06, Carla's new love interest could die from too much excitement.

programme.title: Old Flames
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E07, Sam's newly divorced friend tries to come between him and Diane.

programme.title: Manager Coach
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E08, Coach sports an attitude when he coaches a little-league team.

programme.title: They Call Me Mayday
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E09, Dick Cavett visits Cheers and suggests Sam publish his own writings.

programme.title: How Do I Love Thee? Let Me Call You Back
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E10, Sam finally tells Diane he loves her, but his delivery is detrimental.

programme.title: Just Three Friends
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E11, Diane is furious, when she sees that Sam and her old school chum find each other very attractive.

programme.title: Where There's a Will
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E12, Kramer includes Cheers in his will when he receives a dismal prognosis.

programme.title: Battle of the Exes
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E13, Carla shows up at her ex-husband's wedding with Sam as her date.

programme.title: No Help Wanted
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E14, Sam questions Norm's abilities when he hires him as an accountant.

programme.title: And Coachie Makes Three
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E15, Diane and Sam try to get Coach out of their hair by arranging a double date.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

programme.title: The Mystery of the Milky Way
programme.desc: Hunting the Edge of Space: The Mystery of the Milky Way, S01E01, The Mystery of the Milky Way chronicles the history of telescopes, from Galileo's refractor to Newton's reflector and beyond. This episode also looks at recent missions, including the Herschel Space Observatory's examination of the Milky Wa

programme.title: The Ever Expanding Universe
programme.desc: Hunting the Edge of Space: The Ever Expanding Universe, S01E02, The Ever-Expanding Universe investigates a battery of high-tech telescopes that are joining the Hubble Space Telescope on its quest to unlock the secrets of our universe, a cosmos almost incomprehensible in its size, age and violence.

programme.title: Easy Money / Ambushed
programme.desc: The First 48, S13E11, In Dallas a young father is shot in the back, but no one wants to talk. Then in Cleveland a brazen corner store stickup leaves an innocent clerk dead.

programme.title: Bad Reputation / Deadly Party
programme.desc: The First 48, S14E02, In Cleveland, when a young mother of three is gunned down in front of her home, a neighborhood is paralyzed with fear by a suspect who has a reputation.

programme.title: The Con Artist Killers
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E06, Mother and son grifters crisscross the United States, pulling off every scam and con imaginable but when these criminal masterminds graduate to multiple homicides, they’re finally caught.

programme.title: If the Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E11, The mysterious disappearance and presumed death of a surgeon’s wife sparks a feverish homicide investigation, which quickly goes cold.

programme.title: Blood Thicker Than Marriage
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E16, Cops investigate the apparent carjacking of a husband and wife in East Los Angeles, California only to discover that the ambush was a ruse, carried out by cousins.

programme.title: The Acid Trip

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)

programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: Point Of View

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E15, During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E16, The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan, where the Sudarians were trusted with the module over 10,000 years ago. In their search the team begin to worry about their new allies, and their motives

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E18, Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments. With the help of an old Athosian woman, Teyla looks deep into her past.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E19, With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E20, Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E01, The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E21, Kaye is reunited with old flame Wes Masters. Stephanie undergoes surgery for melanoma performed by her doctor and boyfriend Tom, who plans a romantic surprise for her when surgery is over. Caroline catches Logan cheating on her with Neely.

programme.title: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E22, While in search of underwater treasure, things take a deadly turn when Stephanie and Cody are confronted by a pair of drug smugglers. Back at headquarters, Newman faces off against a different type of treasure hunter…

programme.title: Shark Fever
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E01, Logan decides to write and direct a low-budget action flick at the beach using a drugged shark as the villain, but things get out of hand when the shark Is not properly sedated!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E02, When Mitch Judges the Miss Malibu Beach Bikini Contest, his willpower is tested by two competitors who will do anything to get his vote. Later, Cody designs the "Windjet,” an innovative, new lifesaving boat/waverunner combination.

programme.title: Liquid Assets
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E03, CJ befriends Max, a homeless eccentric who claims that he was once a famous Hollywood Costume designer. When Max dies suddenly, CJ learns he was rich and has left her $4 million in his will. Manny joins junior lifeguards.

programme.title: Windswept
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E04, At the annual Baywatch Lifeguard Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite. The relationship gets complicated when they get stranded on an island and their social status is reversed. Cody joins a local roller hockey team.

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E05, LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach. Lifeguarding gets more chaotic for the team when the Secret Service shows up to inform them that the President is going to go jogging on the beach.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E06, To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E07, CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E09, Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Bachlor of the Month
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E12, Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.
